abstract: Researchers have successfully faked the digital certificates that Web browsers use to verify a site’s authenticity, spotlighting the failure of some security firms to upgrade their technology.
snippet: Researchers have successfully faked the digital certificates that Web browsers use to verify a site’s authenticity, spotlighting the failure of some security firms to upgrade their technology.
lead_paragraph: UPDATED 11:48 a.m.: Added more information about a 2001 certificate problem that involved Microsoft.
